text: Joan Garriga Vilaresau (29 March 1963 - 27 August 2015) was a Spanish Grand Prix motorcycle racer. He raced professionally from 1984 to 1993. He won three 250cc races during his career and finished runner-up to Sito Pons in the 1988 250cc GP World Championship. Garriga was born in Barcelona. After retiring, he was convicted of drug trafficking and possession of weapons in 2003. When the case came to trial, he was given a two-year sentence. He also suffered two heart attacks in 2013 but survived. Garriga was involved in a motorcycle accident on 24 August 2015. He died from his injuries three days later in Barcelona, aged 52. ==References== Category:1963 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Drug dealers Category:Road accident deaths in Spain Category:Sportspeople from Barcelona Category:Spanish criminals Category:Spanish motorcycle racers
